qas.question: In what year did The Times make an endorsement for Barack Obama?
Who did The Times support in 2012 for the election of the U.S. president?
What kind of policy did The Times express reservation for when concerning the political stances of Barack Obama?

context: The Times occasionally makes endorsements for foreign elections. In November <a0_0>2012<a0_0/>, it endorsed a second term for <a1_0>Barack Obama<a1_0/> although it also expressed reservations about his <a2_0>foreign policy<a2_0/>.
